config.sql: SELECT id,text,sntq,bnlj,zje,zjlv,bnys,yswclv,leaf,isNf,m.groups, CASE WHEN((zje >= ( m.zze / 10000) OR zje <= ( m.jse / 10000 )) AND (zjlv >= ( m.zzl * 100 )OR zjlv <= ( m.jsl * 100 ))) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isjump FROM (SELECT c.scode AS id, c.sname AS text, sntq, bnlj, bnlj - sntq AS zje, zjlv, bnys, yswclv, c.cisleaf AS leaf, c.property3 AS isNf FROM (SELECT SUM(nn.fact_snb) AS sntq, SUM(nn.fact_b) AS bnlj, round(DECODE(SUM(nn.fact_snb), 0, 0,(SUM(nn.fact_b) - SUM(nn.fact_snb)) * 100 / abs(SUM(nn.fact_snb))), 2) AS zjlv, SUM(nn.fact_c) AS bnys, CASE WHEN SUM(nn.fact_b) > 0 AND SUM(nn.fact_c) > 0 THEN round(DECODE(SUM(nn.fact_c), 0, 0, SUM(nn.fact_b) * 100 / SUM(nn.fact_c)), 2) WHEN SUM(nn.fact_b) > 0 AND SUM(nn.fact_c) < 0 THEN round(DECODE(SUM(nn.fact_c), 0, 0,(SUM(nn.fact_c) - SUM(nn.fact_b)) * 100 / SUM(nn.fact_c)), 2) WHEN SUM(nn.fact_b) < 0 AND SUM(nn.fact_c) > 0 THEN round(DECODE((SUM(nn.fact_b) - SUM(nn.fact_c)), 0, 0, SUM(nn.fact_b) * 100 / abs(SUM(nn.fact_b) - SUM(nn.fact_c))), 2) WHEN SUM(nn.fact_b) < 0 AND SUM(nn.fact_c) < 0 THEN round(DECODE(SUM(nn.fact_b), 0, 0, SUM(nn.fact_c) * 100 / SUM(nn.fact_b)), 2) END AS yswclv, nn.dim_company AS coms FROM (SELECT round(nvl(fact_b, 0) / 10000, 2) AS fact_b, round(nvl(fact_d, 0) / 10000, 2) AS fact_c, 0 AS fact_snb, dim_company FROM dw_factfinanceperiod WHERE dim_period = :period AND dim_company IN (select scode from dw_dimcompany where spcode = :company and cisdel = 'N' and scode not in (select scode from dw_dimcompany dd where dd.spcode = 0 and dd.scode <> 1)) AND dim_itemperiod =  :item  AND subject = '0002' UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS fact_b, 0 AS fact_c, round(nvl(fact_b, 0) / 10000, 2) AS fact_snb, dim_company FROM dw_factfinanceperiod WHERE dim_period = :comparePeriod AND dim_company IN (select scode from dw_dimcompany where spcode = :company and cisdel = 'N' and scode not in (select scode from dw_dimcompany dd where dd.spcode = 0 and dd.scode <> 1)) AND dim_itemperiod =  :item  AND subject = '0002' ) nn GROUP BY nn.dim_company ) nwt RIGHT JOIN dw_dimcompany c ON nwt.coms = c.scode WHERE c.scode IN (select scode from dw_dimcompany where spcode = :company and cisdel = 'N' and scode not in (select scode from dw_dimcompany dd where dd.spcode = 0 and dd.scode <> 1)) ) w LEFT JOIN ( SELECT mp.scomcode, mp.monitor_zze AS zze, mp.monitor_jse AS jse, mp.monitor_zzl AS zzl, mp.monitor_jsl AS jsl, mi.sgroup AS groups, 6 AS dimpeirod, mp.speriod FROM rpt_monitor_parameter mp INNER JOIN rpt_monitor_index mi ON mp.nmonitor_id = mi.nmonitor_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT scomcode, MAX(speriod) AS speriod FROM rpt_monitor_parameter WHERE speriod <= :period AND spamtype = ( CASE WHEN mod(substr(:period, 5, 2), 3) = 0 THEN '3' ELSE '4' END ) GROUP BY scomcode ) tt ON ( tt.scomcode = mp.scomcode ) WHERE mi.stype = '0002' AND mi.sfieldcode =  :item  AND mp.speriod = tt.speriod AND spamtype = ( CASE WHEN mod(substr(:period, 5, 2), 3) = 0 THEN '3' ELSE '4' END ) ) m ON m.scomcode = w.id order by id
